item.title: Report E-2024090552
item.description:
Report E-2024090552

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-12
  • City: ELKTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Hepaco was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted the length of the trailer and an area measuring approximately 1ft-by-2ft of the asphalt lot and estimated that 50 gallons of material released from one (1) 55-gallon metal drum due to a forklift puncture. Hepaco personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted areas. The spent absorbents were recovered and containerized into four (4) 55-gallon metal drums. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location prior to the contractor demobilization. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.
